companyName: Law Offices of Hicks & Demps - Hopkinsville, KY

moreBlocks.websites: https://www.hopkinsvillelawyers.com http://www.hopkinsvillelawyers.com

moreBlocks.articles:
• Family Law
    Hicks & Demps handles a full range of family law matters including divorce, custody, child support and paternity. The firm also represents clients in family law mediations, which the courts encourage.
  • Personal Injury
    Being the victim of a serious personal injury can affect you for the rest of your life. The Hopkinsville, Kentucky, region law firm of Hicks & Demps represents victims of all types of personal injury and the families of wrongful death victims.
  • Business & Commercial Law
    The western Kentucky law firm of Hicks & Demps provides professional legal services to its business clients. The firm can help you put together and protect your business from start to finish and protect your personal assets.
  • Daniel Carter Hicks - Attorney Profile
    Attorney Daniel Hicks has more than 30 years of experience representing clients in family law, personal injury, estate planning, business and commercial law, criminal law, civil litigation and real estate matters.
  • Katherine Hicks Demps - Attorney Profile
    Attorney Katherine Hicks Demps has more than 15 years of experience representing clients in family law, personal injury, estate planning, business and commercial law, criminal law, civil litigation and real estate matters.

moreBlocks.representativeCases:
• Commonweath v. Scott of Kentucky, 12 S.W. 3d 682 (Ky. Supreme 2000)
  • Mize v. Hughes, 994 S.W. 2d 16 (Ky.Ct. App. 1998)

description:
The Law Offices of Hicks & Demps has been representing clients in Christian County, Kentucky, and surrounding counties since 1997. With 45 years of combined experience, this father-daughter team prides itself in zealously representing and advocating for their clients with skillful attention to detail.

As a general practice law firm, Hicks & Demps handles a wide range of legal matters including family law, criminal law, personal injury, estate planning, probate litigation, business law and commercial law. The firm has a tremendous amount of experience in family law and a large portion of the practice is dedicated to divorce and military divorce.

Not only are the lawyers at Hicks & Demps exceptionally knowledgeable of the law, but they stand out because of their unwavering principles. Guided by integrity and honesty, Hicks & Demps work hard to achieve favorable legal results for their clients. Governed by the concept of "straight talk," these attorneys provide clients with realistic assessments of their legal issues and assist them in resolving their disputes.

The law firm of Hicks & Demps offers reasonable rates for its exceptional services. Contact the lawyers at Hicks & Demps for an initial consultation about your legal issue. For clients' convenience, the firm accepts credit cards for services offered.
